00018     def decodePlan(self):

00031     def parseRoomList(room_list):
00032 
00033         rooms, roomDesc, roomSizes = [],[],[]
00034         roomarea, roomlist = [],[]
00035         
00036         # call the room-classification routine
00037         rooms = roomClassifier.f1(room_list)
00038         roomNum = rooms[-1:]
00039         rooms = rooms[:-1]
00040 
00041         numRoom = 0
00042 
00043         for k in xrange(0,len(rooms)/2):
00044             roomDesc.append(rooms[2*k])
00045             roomSizes.append(rooms[2*k+1])
00046 
00047         for k in xrange(len(roomDesc)):
00048             if roomDesc[k] != 'S':
00049                 numRoom = numRoom + 1
00050 
00051         # call the area calculation routine
00052         roomarea = roomArea.f1(roomDesc,roomSizes)
00053         # call the adjoining-room calculation routine 
00054         roomlist = sharedWalls.f1(roomNum,roomDesc,roomSizes)
00055 
00056         return [numRoom, roomarea, roomlist, roomDesc, roomSizes]
